title: Why is the Tristan skin unavailable?
body: How long is it going to be unavailable for? I really want this skin! >.< Any information would be appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey Lukee13,

It'll definitely be during some point during the 5.23 patch. My best guess is that it'll go on sale today, but again, no specific date has been announced besides that it'll 
>be released [...] during patch 5.23

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-523-notes#patch-upcoming-skins
